The Android app that could

Previous Next

Main Features

  • Quick access to medical information from the lock screen
  • Support multiple profiles for family medical information
  • ICE contacts definition and call from the lock screen without unlocking
  • Emergency alert feature to send SMS in one tap (including your location if available)
  • Body Mass Index (BMI) calculation
  • Current location (address, GPS coordinates)
  • Nearby hospitals localisation
  • Compass
